mapper.select: select id as id, name as name, user_number as userNumber, code_type as codeType, code as code, compy as compy, image as photo, image_type as photoType, finger as fingerPrint, finger2 as fingerPrint2, finger_type as fingerPrintType, phone as phone, note as note from fin_mbox_user where status =1
select count(id) from fin_mbox_user where code=#{code} and status=1
mapper.insert:
SELECT FIN_SEQ_MBOX_USER.nextval AS id FROM DUAL
insert into fin_mbox_user (id, name, user_number, code_type, code, compy, image, image_type, finger, finger2, finger_type, phone, note, status,create_time,modify_time) values(#{id},#{name},#{userNumber},#{codeType},#{code},#{compy}, #{photo},#{photoType},#{fingerPrint},#{fingerPrint2},#{fingerPrintType}, #{phone},#{note},1,sysdate,sysdate)
mapper.select: select id as id, name as name, user_number as userNumber, code_type as codeType, code as code, compy as compy, image as photo, image_type as photoType, finger as fingerPrint, finger2 as fingerPrint2, finger_type as fingerPrintType, phone as phone, note as note from fin_mbox_user where status =1 and modify_time > #{update}
